    • Constructor Detail

      • FireDanger

        public FireDanger(double dry,
                  double wet,
                  double iSnow,
                  double precip,
                  double wind,
                  double buo,
                  int iHerb)
        Instantiates a new fire danger.
        Parameters:
        dry - is the Dry Bulb Temperature
        wet - is the Wet Bulb Temperature
        iSnow - is some positive non zero number if there is snow on the ground
        precip - the amount precipitation in inches and hundredths
        wind - the wind speed mph 20 feet above open level ground
        buo - was yesterday's buildup
        iHerb - is the current herb state of the district 1=cured, 2=Transition and 3=Green
